/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high angle, providing a bird's eye view of the street below. The street is teeming with life, lined with a variety of buildings and shops that add to the urban charm of the scene. Cars and pedestrians can be seen navigating their way through the street, adding a dynamic element to the image. The sky above is a clear blue, dotted with fluffy white clouds, casting a bright light over the scene. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the blue of the sky contrasting beautifully with the various hues of the buildings and cars.
